text:
The second "Copying tree" line below appears to be superfluous, which slows 
down remote installations over slow-link NFS connections considerably.

===> [data: Installing initial data files]
Copying tree ./htdocs/ -> /usr/local/apache/htdocs/
Copying tree ./htdocs/manual -> //usr/local/apache/htdocs/manual/
creator: apache@morgandavis.net
